title: Bella's Bites Soups and Salads
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has vegetarian and vegan soups, salads, and other dishes which are marked on the menu. You do have to tell that you don't want a dairy topping. Fresh juices available. Inside the mall.
